metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17002 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: If upgrade-insecure-requests was specified in the Content Security Policy, and a link was dragged and dropped from that page, the link was not upgraded to https. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 70.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
